Story The Invitation Dear guest: I formally invite you to the Library.\nThe Library’s books can provide you with all the wisdom,\n wealth, honor, and power you seek.\nHowever, an ordeal will await you in the Library.\nIf you cannot overcome this ordeal,\nyou will be converted into a book yourself. - Angela Books of the Day Register Book Unneeded Addressee Send Invitation Check Guest Information View Credenza Guest Resolvable Rewards Available after receiving guests Recall Story Pre-Battle Post-Battle Recall Sephirah Story Begin Stageplay Remaining Acts: {0} Floors Available: Book Information Combat Pages Battle Symbol Act {0} Curtains Closed Proceed Battle Symbols Gained Battle Symbols Lost Books Resolved Books Lost None No Books Resolved Close {0} Realization Level Up! Reject Roland, and Angela will embrace this sorrow to grasp at freedom. Forgive Roland, and Angela will let go of it all to turn everything back to how it was. Angela would only be able to do this after fully Realizing what she needed to on each floor. Snub Angela, and Roland will exact his revenge with this last step. Forgive Angela. Roland would only put things behind him after fully Realizing what he needed to on each floor.
